Verses: 1  sagodharare, Naan Ungalidaththil Vandhapodhu, Dhevanaippatriya Saatchiyai Sirandha Vasanippodaavadhu Gnaanaththodaavadhu Arivikkiravanaaga Varavillai.
2  yesukiristhuvai, Siluvaiyil Araiyappatta Avaraiyeyandri, Verondraiyum Ungalukkulle Ariyaadhirukkath Theermaaniththirundhen.
3  allaamalum Naan Balaveenaththodum Bayaththodum Migundha Nadukkaththodum Ungalidaththil Irunthen.
4  ungal Visuvaasam Manusharudaiya Gnaanaththilalla, Dhevanudaiya Belaththil Nirkumpadikku,
5  en Pechchum En Pirasangamum Manusha Gnaanaththirkuriya Nayavasanamulladhaayiraamal, Aaviyinaalum Belaththinaalum Urudhippaduththappattadhaayirundhadhu.
6  appadiyirundhum, Therinavargalukkulle Gnaanaththai Pesugirom; Ippirapanjaththin Gnaanaththaiyalla, Azhindhupogiravargalaagiya Ippirapanjaththin Pirabukkaludaiya Gnaanaththaiyumalla,
7  ulagaththotraththirku Munne Dhevan Nammudaiya Magimaikkaaga Erpaduththinadhum, Maraikkappattadhumaayirundha Ragasiyamaana Devagnaanaththaiye Pesugirom.
8  adhai Ippirapanjaththup Pirabukkalil Oruvanum Ariyavillai; Arindhaargalaanaal, Magimaiyin Karththarai Avargal Siluvaiyil Araiyamaattaargale.
9  ezhudhiyirukkirapadi: Dhevan Thammil Anbukoorugiravargalukku Aayaththampanninavaigalaik Kan Kaanavumillai, Kaadhuketkavumillai, Avaigal Manushanudaiya Irudhayaththil Thondravumillai;
10  namakko Dhevan Avaigalaith Thamadhu Aaviyinaale Velippaduththinaar; Andha Aaviyaanavar Ellaavatraiyum, Dhevanudaiya Aazhangalaiyum, Aaraaindhirukkiraar.
11  manushanilulla Aaviyeyandri Manusharil Evan Manushanukkuriyavaigalai Arivaan? Appadippola, Dhevanudaiya Aaviyeyandri, Oruvanum Dhevanukkuriyavaigalai Ariyamaattaan.
12  naangalo Ulagaththin Aaviyaipperaamal, Dhevanaal Engalukku Arulappattavaigalai Ariyumpadikku Dhevanilirundhu Purappadugira Aaviyaiye Petrom.

13  avaigalai Naangal Manushagnaanam Pothikkira Vaarththaigalaale Pesaamal, Parisuththa Aavi Podhikkira Vaarththaigalaale Pesi, Aavikkuriyavaigalai Aavikkuriyavaigalode Sambandhappaduththikkaanbikkirom.

14  jenmasubaavamaana Manushano Dhevanudaiya Aavikkuriyavaigalai Etrukkollaan; Avaigal Avanukkup Paiththiyamaagath Thondrum; Avaigal Aavikketrapiragaaramaai Aaraaindhu Nidhaanikkappadugiravaigalaanadhaal, Avaigalai Ariyavumaattaan.
15  aavikkuriyavan Ellaavatraiyum Aaraaindhu Nidhaanikkiraan; Aanaalum Avan Matroruvanaalum Aaraaindhu Nidhaanikkappadaan.
16  karththarukku Podhikkaththakkadhaaga Avarudaiya Sindhaiyai Arindhavan Yaar? Engalukko Kiristhuvin Sindhai Undaayirukkiradhu.
